message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for both of us to come to a mutually beneficial agreement. I'm willing to start with an offer of $12000 for the product. What are your thoughts?
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10500. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'm not willing to go above that. What do you think?

Thanks for the counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $12500. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price for the product. What do you think?
I understand your concerns, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so I'm offering $11750. Can you consider that?
I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. I'm thinking of $13000. What do you think?
I understand you're trying to get closer to your minimum price, but I'm still not comfortable with $13000. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so I'm offering $12500. Can you consider that?

I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're not going to meet in the middle, Bob. However, I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm thinking of $13500. This is as low as I'm willing to go. What do you think?
I understand you're trying to make one last concession, but I'm still not comfortable with $13500. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so I'm offering $13250. Can you consider that?

I've made several concessions, Bob, and I'm not willing to go any lower than $14000. This is my final offer. I'm confident that this is a fair price for the product, and I hope you can meet me at this point. What do you think?

I appreciate your persistence, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with $14000. I'm willing to make a final offer of $13000. This is my last offer, and I hope you can meet me at this point. If not, I'll have to consider buying from John for $15000.
